summary: This bill, S.2942, introduced by Mr. Blumenthal, aims to grant permanent resident status to Valent Kolami. It overrides certain sections of the Immigration and Nationality Act to allow Kolami to apply for an immigrant visa or adjust their status. The bill specifies conditions, including filing an application within two years of the Act's enactment with the required fees.  It also addresses the budgetary impact of the Act under the Statutory Pay-As-You-Go Act of 2010.
